page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: EMPLOYMENT IN THIS RURAL AREA OF POWYS IS PREDOMINANTLY TIED UP WITH THE SERVICE INDUSTRIES:MANY PEOPLE WORKING FOR THE LOCAL HOSPITALS WHICH ARE SITUATED A FEW KILOMETRES AWAY OR FOR THE LOCAL COUNCIL. SEVERAL SMALL HILL FARMS WHICH ARE OWNER OCCUPIED EMPLOY LOCAL MEN, SOMETIMES SEASONALLY. THE SCHOOL CANTEENS IN OR JUST OUT OF THE AREA GIVE EMPLOYMENT TO MANY WOMEN AND OTHERS HELP IN THE HOTELS JUST OUTSIDE THE AREA. THERE ARE VARIOUS SELF-EMPLOYED PEOPLE; A FUNERAL DIRECTOR,SEVERAL SMALL BUILDERS, FOREST CLEARER,CARPET-LAYER AND DOUBLE GLAZIER AMONGST THEM. THE TREKKING CENTRE GIVES EMPLOYMENT TO A FEW AS GUIDES ON A PART TIME BASIS AND SEVERAL YOUTHS FIND WORK WITH GARAGES ON THE FRINGE OF THE AREA OR AS CASUAL LABOUR WITH LOCAL FARMERS.
